程序包 com.opensource.bitmapfun.util
的使用

  • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util使用的com.opensource.bitmapfun.util中的类 
    类和说明
    AsyncTaskEx
    AsyncTaskEx enables proper and easy use of the UI thread.
    AsyncTaskEx.Status
    Indicates the current status of the task.
    BitmapUtils.Size 
    DiskLruCache
    A simple disk LRU bitmap cache to illustrate how a disk cache would be used for bitmap caching.
    ImageCache
    This class holds our bitmap caches (memory and disk).
    ImageCache.ImageCacheParams
    A holder class that contains cache parameters.
    ImageResizer
    A simple subclass of ImageWorker that resizes images from resources given a target width and height.
    ImageWorker
    This class wraps up completing some arbitrary long running work when loading a bitmap to an
    ImageView.
    ImageWorker.ImageWorkerAdapter
    A very simple adapter for use with ImageWorker class and subclasses.
    ImageWorker.LoadListener 
    RetainFragment
    A simple non-UI Fragment that stores a single Object and is retained over configuration changes.
